summary: This module implements a Prefect worker that runs flow runs in separate operatingâ€‘system processes. It defines a configuration class for building the command line, a worker class that starts, monitors, and terminates the subprocess, and a result class that captures the final status and output of the execution. Helper utilities parse and retrieve the infrastructure process identifier and optionally use a threaded watcher for child processes.
business_intent: Provide a reliable, isolated execution environment for Prefect flow runs by launching them as subprocesses, allowing users to poll work pools, manage process lifecycles, and collect execution results in a structured way.
